sentences.english: ObjectiveTo explore the clinical effect of cognitive-behavior therapy and drug treatment on anxiety.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討認知行爲療法結合藥物治療焦慮症的療效。

sentences.english: Other mental illnesses may accompany anxiety.
sentences.chinese: 其他精神病會伴隨焦慮症。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo explore the effect of calligraphy training plus venlafaxine in the treatment of anxiety disorder.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討書法訓練配合博樂欣治療焦慮症的療效。

sentences.english: The effect of social isolation 1 is similar to that of anxiety or work-related stress.
sentences.chinese: 社交孤立的影響類似於焦慮症或工作壓力。

sentences.english: Being incontinent can cause you to have social anxiety disorder .
sentences.chinese: 您有可能導致被失禁社交焦慮症。

sentences.english: Conclusion Venlafaxine is a safe and efficient drug with fewer side effects for the treatment of generalized anxiety disorder.
sentences.chinese: 結論怡諾思治療廣泛性焦慮症安全有效，不良反應少。

sentences.english: The effect of social isolation is similar to that of anxiety or work-related stress.
sentences.chinese: 社交孤立的影響類似於焦慮症或工作壓力。

sentences.english: Prolonged stress, for over six months, may worsen and become generalized anxiety.
sentences.chinese: 六個月以上的長時間緊張感可能惡化成廣泛性焦慮症。

sentences.english: She had no family history of depression or anxiety.
sentences.chinese: 她的家族史上沒有抑鬱症或焦慮症病人。

sentences.english: Anxiety disorders have effects on your health.
sentences.chinese: 焦慮症對你的健康有負面影響。

sentences.english: I think that Schuman and Summer feel too much heat from China, and cling to a lesser opponent for the relief.
sentences.chinese: 我想舒曼是得中國焦慮症，因而貶損對方以求安慰。

sentences.english: It is revealed that Chinese medicine is quite effective in the relief of anxiety.
sentences.chinese: 提示中藥解鬱方對焦慮症有較好的緩解效果。

sentences.english: Anxiety-ridden students list schoolwork as their chief stressor. U.
sentences.chinese: 深受焦慮症之苦的學生們將課業列爲首要的壓力源。

sentences.english: As anxiety makers, examinations are second to none①.
sentences.chinese: 考試作爲“焦慮症製造者”是無人能及的。

sentences.english: Thee effect of social isolation is similar to that of anxiety or work-related stress.
sentences.chinese: 社交孤立的影響類似於焦慮症或工作壓力。

definition: less capable than desirable (idiom); not as strong as one would wish/the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak
to stake all on one throw
man of Qǐ fears the sky falling (idiom); groundless fears
to suffer from pent-up frustrations/mental knot/emotional issue
to view sb as an enemy/to be hateful towards
